Gamium.title: Gamium AI Sandbox
Gamium.subtitle: The Digital Drill Ground for AI Risk Control
Gamium.concept: Banks don't need to replace existing systems; they need a 'High-Fidelity Evaluation Sandbox'. AI agents battle 'Red Teams' in a virtual environment, undergoing thousands of simulations to ensure safety and compliance before production deployment.
Gamium.理念Desc: Without modifying the bank's core CRM system, Gamium 'Digital Drill Ground' safely unleashes AI productivity. Through Mock technology, it builds a 1:1 simulation of the business environment, achieving 'test-driven adoption'.
Gamium.feature1Desc: Red Team (simulated fraudsters) uses large models to generate logically consistent but subtly false information. Blue Team (risk control copilot) must identify deception through multi-round dialogues.
Gamium.feature2Desc: Creates a 'twin interface' of the bank's CRM system, returning carefully designed 'edge case data' to test AI's judgment when facing extreme, ambiguous, or fraudulent data.
Gamium.feature3Desc: Outputs 'AI EEG' reports, completely recording every AI decision (Thinking Process), making black-box models transparent to meet regulatory audit requirements.
Gamium.场景1Desc: AI automatically reads documents and outputs 'Preliminary Risk Alert'. Before going live, 5,000 'virtual audits' are conducted to ensure accurate risk identification.
Gamium.场景2Desc: Through large-scale boundary testing, ensures AI can maintain compliance boundaries and identify money laundering risks, politically sensitive persons, and other scenarios.
Gamium.价值1Desc: Transforms experienced credit officers' tacit knowledge into test cases, achieving AI pre-job training.
Gamium.价值2Desc: Every AI decision is fully recorded, outputting traceable decision rationale.
Gamium.价值3Desc: Generates thousands of 'virtual enterprises' for large-scale boundary testing.

Cases.subtitle: Deep expertise in financial industry, providing professional digital transformation solutions for leading enterprises

bankEmail.title: State-owned Bank Email Migration
bankEmail.challenge: Need to migrate from IBM Lotus Domino platform to domestic email system, involving 40 domestic branches, 50 overseas branches, 400K+ users, facing different regulatory requirements globally.
bankEmail.solution: Adopted dual-track operation mode, customized data migration tools, proposed different solutions for different regulatory requirements, implemented centralized and local deployment solutions.
bankEmail.results: Over three years, email migration solution was deployed across 40 domestic branches, 50 overseas branches, and multiple direct institutions, achieving full domestic replacement for 400K+ users. Reduced user workload and improved user experience.

securitiesOA.title: Securities Firm OA Transformation
securitiesOA.challenge: Need to complete IT innovation migration of hundreds of core business processes, ensuring seamless user switching, online editing, document preview and other key functions.
securitiesOA.solution: Comprehensive migration of core business processes, achieving seamless user switching, online editing, document preview and other key functions, providing customized solutions for personalized needs of various departments.
securitiesOA.results: Completed IT innovation migration of hundreds of core business processes, achieved seamless user switching, online editing, document preview and other key functions, continuously optimized personalized needs of various departments.

commercialWPS.title: Commercial Bank WPS Collaboration
commercialWPS.challenge: Facing five major business pain points: difficult document collaboration, cross-platform management, document collection and retrieval, document security, and document control.
commercialWPS.solution: Based on WPS collaboration platform, achieved multi-platform document management, access, editing, enhanced interaction between customers and employees, provided complete document security system.
commercialWPS.results: WPS collaboration development, comprehensive document management upgrade, achieved multi-platform document management, improved collaboration efficiency, ensured document security.

zerocraftRequirement.title: Securities Requirement Management System
zerocraftRequirement.challenge: Need to achieve full-process management of requirement feedback, application, workflow, and history, accurately locate customer needs, data precipitation to form customer profiles.
zerocraftRequirement.solution: Rapidly built on ZeroCraft platform, achieved full-process management of requirement feedback, application, workflow, and history, based on sample data annotation, extracted requirement tags.
zerocraftRequirement.results: Instant response to customer needs, resource matching and efficient collaboration, accurate customer needs positioning, data precipitation and customer profiles. Requirement forms reflect real customer needs with high analytical value.

zerocraftDefect.title: Financial Institution Defect Management Platform
zerocraftDefect.challenge: Need to build microservices-based development platform, achieve containerized deployment, high availability, full-link tracking, complete security system.
zerocraftDefect.solution: Based on ZeroCraft platform, Web IDE development interface, AI-accelerated development experience, containerized deployment, application-level high availability, full-link tracking, standardized log extraction, complete security system.
zerocraftDefect.results: Rapid deployment based on Docker and K8s, elastic scaling, full-link tracking, non-invasive, minimal performance overhead, standardized integration interfaces, flexible adaptation mechanisms, unified integration management.

aiEvaluation.title: Securities Company AI Q&A Evaluation
aiEvaluation.challenge: Need to select professional, compliant and stable solutions from multiple large models and different investment advisory strategies, lacking unified selection, acceptance and continuous evaluation tools.
aiEvaluation.solution: Established standard test sets covering account opening, trading rules, product consultation, investment advisory scenarios, conducted multi-round dialogue evaluation of multiple models, performed AB testing for different prompts and strategies.
aiEvaluation.results: Helped customers complete first-round model and strategy selection, improved Q&A scenario accuracy by about 20%, significantly reduced violations and inappropriate expressions. Initially formed securities industry Q&A sample library and unified indicator standards.
